short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official Takedwn chrome extension. Use this tool to easily submit a Google DMCA takedown request and/or a domain DMCA request.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Takedwn Chrome Extension syncs with the DMCA Takedown tool at Takedwn.com. The Takedwn Chrome Extension is for all Takedwn users. The extension syncs with the tool to provide for the faster, more accurate completion of tasks at takedwn.com.
